title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Discussion-Based Decision-Making Education for Sustainability Advocacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and general awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop and present three or more mutually exclusive argument structures regarding sustainability-related issues.
Learners systematically analyze the complexity of sustainability decision-making using the Target-Mat tool, performing the process at least twice.
Learners collaborate with peers to compare and evaluate conflicting perspectives on sustainability definitions and derive consensus solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
